attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the recent news that the UK is to give Zimbabwe $100 million in aid, I believe the time is right to stop all foreign aid, a fraction of which actually gets to the people because of corruption at high levels. Why should the UK suffer cutbacks across the board while we are sending millions if not billions of pounds of OUR money abroad?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
